public.help:
Ask Heimdall to teach you his ways... `[command]` is optional.
Use: `!help [command]`
public.ping:
Ping Heimdall and hope he honours you with a response.
Use: `!ping`
public.say:
Ask Heimdall to say something for you.
Use: `!say [message]`
public.embed:
Ask Heimdall to embed something for you. Anything before a newline is the title, and after it is the description.
Use: `!embed [title]
[description]`

member.status:
Check the status of the Arma 3 servers.
Use: `!status`

nco.run:
Execute a particular command configured on the server.
Use: `!start [command_preset]`
nco.start:
Start a particular server profile. I.e. `!start arma "Operations Server"`.
Use: `!start [server] [server_profile]`
Servers to choose from:
- `arma`: Arma 3 server
nco.stop:
Stop a particular server or only a particular server profile. I.e. `!stop arma` or `!stop arma "Operations Server"`.
Use: `!stop [server] [server_profile (optional)]`
Servers to choose from:
- `arma`: Arma 3 servers
